aboutMeDescription: Hello! I'm Limber MartÃ­nez, a web development enthusiast with a focus on frontend.

accordion1.title: My Journey in Web Development
accordion1.content: My interest in programming began in 2020 when I started a food delivery project from supermarkets (doliefero). This experience led me to learn technologies like WordPress, Shopify, and dive into HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I also became familiar with server management and the importance of SEO and digital marketing for the success of a web project.

accordion2.title: Solid Foundation
accordion2.content: My education at the ILS Institut fÃ¼r Lernsysteme in Hamburg provided me with a solid foundation in frontend technologies like HTML, CSS, and JS, along with a deep understanding of German web development regulations, including AGBs (Terms and Conditions), Impressum (Legal Notice), and Datenschutz (Data Protection Policies).

accordion3.title: Specialization and Learning
accordion3.content: At the National Technological University (UTN) in Argentina, I strengthened my frontend development skills with React and Angular and gained basic knowledge in backend development with NodeJS.

accordion4.title: Continuous Learning
accordion4.content: My recent participation in the Oracle One Altura Education Alura program introduced me to Java, Spring Boot, Hibernate, JPA, and the agile Scrum methodology.

projects.title: Reservation System
projects.description: Frontend project developed in Angular with a backend in Java Spring Boot and MySQL database. Created as a solution for reservations with phone number validation, responsive and multilingual. Deployed on Railway. Challenges and learning experiences in my journey as a junior developer.

projects.title: Portfolio Project
projects.description: Frontend portfolio project developed in React, responsive, and multilingual. Helped me dive into React, learn about routing systems, content import from data services, and explore multilingual support. A journey filled with challenges.

projects.title: Text Encryptor and Decryptor
projects.description: I developed this project as a student in the Oracle Alura Latam program. It is a text encryptor and decryptor that uses HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to transform specific words. This experience has helped me enhance my skills and understanding of web programming and code design.

decriptionThisProject: In this Angular and Bootstrap project, I've developed a responsive, multilingual web application. I've learned to set global variables in SCSS, consume dynamic data from Data Service, and configure the messaging service with Email.js. I faced challenges in real-time language updates across multiple components but found effective solutions. This experience has taught me a lot as a junior developer.
COOKIE_MESSAGE: We use cookies and other tracking technologies to improve your browsing experience on our website, to show you personalized content and targeted ads, to analyze our website traffic, and to understand where our visitors are coming from.
